#summary How to install strategico

= Requirements =

Strategico requires the library AST that at the moment works only in Linux/Unix 


You need to install 
 * the [http://www.r-project.org R] (release >= 2.11) statistical software

and the following R libraries (see [http://cran.r-project.org/web/packages/ CRAN] for a full list of R libraries):
 * [http://cran.r-project.org/web/packages/getopt getopt]
 * [http://cran.r-project.org/web/packages/futile.logger utile.logger]
 * [http://cran.r-project.org/web/packages/reshape/ reshape]
 * [http://cran.r-project.org/web/packages/hwriter/index.html hwriter]
 * [http://cran.r-project.org/web/packages/RMySQL/index.html RMySQL library]
 * [http://cran.r-project.org/web/packages/forecast/index.html Forecast library] that requires fracdiff and tseries
 * [http://cran.r-project.org/web/packages/R2HTML/index.html R2HTML library]
 * [http://cran.r-project.org/web/packages/RUnit/index.html runit]
 * [http://cran.r-project.org/web/packages/xtable/index.html xtable library]
 * [http://sirio.stat.unipd.it/index.php?id=libast ast library]
 * [http://cran.r-project.org/web/packages/brew/index.html brew]

For Debian and Ubuntu some of the libraries are available via
{{{
  apt-get install r-cran-xtable r-cran-runit r-cran-getopt r-cran-xtable r-cran-rodbc r-cran-tseries
}}} 

Otherwise you can use R command
{{{
  install.packages(c("getopt", "futile.logger", "hwriter", "RODBC", "tseries", "forecast", "RUnit", "xtable", "R2HTML","fracdiff", "brew"), dependencies = TRUE)
}}}

if you use the web application, install also 
{{{
  install.packages("googleVis")
}}}

= Installation =

Download strategico.zip from [http://code.google.com/p/strategico/downloads/list Download tab] and unzip it into a folder like /apps/strategico (Linux) or C:\strategico


= Configuration =

== Environment ==

Set a variable STRATEGICO_HOME in your environment

Under Linux you could add

{{{
 export STRATEGICO_HOME=/opt/strategico
}}}

in your /etc/profile or $HOME/.bashrc

== Database ==

Enter in mysql console with

  mysql -u root

{{{
 CREATE DATABASE strategico CHARACTER SET utf8 COLLATE utf8_general_ci;

 grant all on strategico.* to r identified by 'r';
 grant all on strategico.* to r@'%' identified by 'r';
 flush privileges;
}}}
